text: Ernesto Montero Bicumba (born 17 April 1998) is an Equatoguinean footballer who plays as a left back for Liga Nacional de Fútbol club Cano Sport Academy and the Equatorial Guinea national team. ==International career== Montero made his international debut for Equatorial Guinea in 2018. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Equatoguinean footballers Category:People from Malabo Category:Equatorial Guinea international footballers Category:Cano Sport Academy players
title: Ernesto Montero
